about_the_game:
DLC for the program RutonyChat.

Allows you to rename titles for the broadcast on the sites:
- Twitch
- GoodGame
- Trovo
- VKPlay

The advantage is that you edit the titles, game, etc. of all broadcasts in one window. Also there is support for templates that allow you to quickly specify the titles of the previously saved template.

Important!
This add-on requires connection to sites.
For Twitch, you need to enabled Alerts - Subscriber and/or Host.
VKontakte can only be renamed when a translation is alive.
Goodgame requires a connected of Alerts - Subscribers.
